text:
3. 展现形式（要不要演讲人，也就是每个大的主题里面放一个演讲的/“导游”进去）
4. 要不要把英语部门放到我们活动当中（文学类作品）
5. 海报该怎么展示（每个海报都有一个相框，or其它类型）
6. 奖品是什么
7. 这个活动是想要以poster为主还是想要很多不同的板块（ex动物照片，文学类诗歌，小挂件。。。）（ 若想要不同的板块，我们就需要演讲人，并且参观时间也需要延长，但是我们可以在上面卖小挂件，如果美术老师同意，我们还可以卖学生作品，可以赚钱）
trans:
3. The form of the presentation ( a speaker or not, i.e. a speaker/"tour guide" for each of the major themes)
4. Whether or not to include the English department in our programme ( works of literature)
5. How the posters should be displayed (one frame for each poster, or some other format)
6. What are the prizes
7. Should the event be poster-based or should we have many different sections (photos of animals, literary poems, wall hangings...) (If we want different kinds of sections, we need speakers and the visit will be longer. But we can sell small wall hangings on it. If the art teacher agrees, we can also sell students' works and make money)
